name: Dark Spirit of the Denial
desc: At the start of the Damage Step, if an opponent's monster attacks: You can send this card from your hand or field to the GY, then target 1 Level 8 Fiend monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but negate its effects (if any), and if you do, change the attack target to it and perform damage calculation. If a Level 8 Fiend monster(s) is sent to your GY while this card is in your GY: You can add this card to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Dark Spirit of the Denial" once per turn.
